About ME

BIO

Working as a server-side developer in Fintech Application Project developed for small merchants for cashless payments using innovative digital technology enabling the use of mobile money. It is designed to solve money transfer from small group of people in closed loop.This project is currently in production. Effectively coded software changes on design specifications Developed many small demo projects and solved many complex Jira issues by going through server logs. Sound knowledge of deployments and maintaining the version using github/bitbucket Research & Development on front-end UI for projects displaying Reports in React.js

Front-end: React Js

Back-end: Java,Hibernate

Server: Apache Tomcat
